task.title: Installing the Sametime Meeting add-in from a file
task.shortdesc: You can install the HCL Sametime Meetings add-in to Microsoft Outlook from a URL.

step.cmd: In the Add-Ins window, click My add-ins.
In the Custom add-ins section, click Add a custom add-in.
From the drop-down menu select Add from file.

image.alt: Graphic showing Add from file link

step.cmd: Choose the location of the file where the user hosts the application. To choose the file:

substep.cmd: Run the command in the command prompt to download the XML file to the local drive.
substep.info: For example: https://<hostname of sametime installation>/outlook/manifest.xml -o manifest.xml

substep.cmd: Press enter. It downloads the XML file to the local drive. The user can choose the file from the location.

step.cmd: A warning message displays on screen. Click Install.

image.alt: Warning message to verify that add-in is from a trusted source

step.cmd: After the installation completes, the HCL Sametime Meetings add-in is listed under the Custom add-ins section.

image.alt: Graphic showing HCL Sametime Meeting added

taskbody.result: You can now add a Sametime meeting when scheduling a meeting in Outlook. The Sametime Meeting icon is located in the meeting scheduler task bar. Click the icon to add a meeting room to the meeting invitation.
